data.text: @bensimmoneau Are these deaths due to covid or with COVID?

@frizzo402 @RealRickSinger @Michael31708280 @bensimmoneau @WCVB I have a kid on high-dose immunosuppressants. If he's exposed to Covid, he has to get treatment ASAP.

Thanks for your human kindness. Now I remember why I had you blocked.

@frizzo402 @Michael31708280 @RealRickSinger @bensimmoneau I was already in the middle of composing that reply when I saw yours. 

Someone ordered them for you.

Go to this link. Enter your name and address. If you get this message, someone ordered them for you.

https://t.co/oCD5mBVEBl https://t.co/MsUbXNDz19
@cindymclennan @RealRickSinger @Michael31708280 @bensimmoneau @WCVB Anywho…..good luck with your endless testing and life full of fear. We will wave at you from the outside.

@cindymclennan @RealRickSinger @Michael31708280 @bensimmoneau Well if someone did@that, knowing me, and my personal beliefs, shame on them. Should’ve requested them@for@someone that wanted them. Btw…that would be fraud if your going around randomly ordering under a false name. Maybe @WCVB should look into your assumptions

@cindymclennan @Michael31708280 @RealRickSinger @bensimmoneau I guess literacy isn’t your strong suit. I live alone as previously stated, they came to my home, addressed to me. I would not order them as I am vaxxed & had covid prior to that. once it was discovered the vax does stop or even slow the spread I stopped listening. They’re trash

@frizzo402 @Michael31708280 @RealRickSinger @bensimmoneau They were not randomly shipped. You had to request tests, ,and if one person in your home requested them, that was all the household could receive.

Before you make up lies about a government program, find out how the program works, so your lie will be plausible.
@RealRickSinger @cindymclennan @Michael31708280 @bensimmoneau I live alone and received 4. I requested nothing.
